name: Banking on Business
title: Most Business-Friendly Banking System
description: In 2023, 64.5% of firms in Peru used banks to finance their working capital, showcasing the country's robust banking support for businesses.

name: Teaching Troubles
title: Lowest Percentage of Trained Primary Teachers
description: Only 13.1% of primary school teachers in Peru were trained in 2023, highlighting a significant gap in educational quality and teacher preparedness.
